title: Telling a new player what items to buy
body:
https://giphy.com/gifs/team-fortress-2-8SfehxbuTK9CE

And then they still do their own thing.

https://giphy.com/gifs/nope-team-fortress-2-FlCxB0YzQK0HC

replies.body: "Yeah I promise this is what the pros build. Of course! Rush Archangels Staff on Aatrox! Then get about 2 Warmogs. Yes Moby Boots with Distortion! Don't forget your Mana Pots"
